dialog.text: N/A
Whaaaaat?! You can start the segment from up there?! Well... sure, I guess... Let's begin the SBS...

qa.summary: Oda starts the Q&A segment reluctantly from an unusual starting point.

dialog.text: That's SBS-san to you. P.N. Kimurin

matches: File:SBS73 1 Gasu Gasu Fart.png|thumb|right|300px|Left: Dad; Bottom: Me

qa.summary: The reader corrects Oda by calling him SBS-san, and Oda responds with a surprised apology.

dialog.text: My dad can shoot "[[Shinokuni]]" from out of his butt. Does he have the powers of [[Gasu Gasu no Mi]]? P.N. Okku

qa.summary: Reader asks if his dad has powers of Gasu Gasu no Mi, but Oda clarifies they are just farts, and not related to Devil Fruit powers.

dialog.text: I'm sure you must've gotten countless letters pointing out that you drew the "DEATH" tattoos on [[Trafalgar D. Water Law|Law]]'s fingers wrong... In my opinion, whenever this happens, it's because Law is using [[Ope Ope no Mi#Attacks|Shambles]] on the parts above and below the knuckles to switch them around! Wow, that [[Ope Ope no Mi]] comes in real handy (if you know what I mean)! P.N. Kamiki

Uhmm... yeah. I got a lot of those letters. They all say I screwed up! (cries) That's what everyone says! But you know what, you're right on the money! That's right. If they're ever facing the wrong direction or missing entirely...it was all Shambles!

qa.summary: Readers point out Law's 'DEATH' tattoos were drawn wrong; Oda confirms it and jokes that it's due to Law using Shambles to switch them around.

dialog.text: [[Chapter 711]], [[Chapters and Volumes/Volume 71-Current#Volume 71|Volume 71]]. The big panel. I see some candy falling out of [[Nico Robin|Robin]]'s bag. Was she going to give that to [[Tony Tony Chopper|Chopper]]? P.N. Anmitsu Usagi

qa.summary: Robin was indeed going to give the candy to Chopper, as she always keeps some of his favorite candy to give to him at any time.

dialog.text: Hey, Odacchi! On page 109 of Volume 71, was [[Monkey D. Luffy|Luffy]] going to call [[Bellamy]] "Mallony"?! Was he thinking of the snack food company Malony? If Luffy's head is full of nothing but food, then I'm more like [[Sanji]]—my head is full of girls. What's inside your head, Odacchi? P.N. Shin

qa.summary: Luffy's thought process referencing a snack company was true, and Oda's head is filled with serious business, despite the humorous bustiness comment.

dialog.text: Hello! (^ v ^) I have a question. You know there's a woman in both Chapter 707 and 708 who's covering her face to avoid seeing Bartolomeo's "thing". But...she's not covering her eyes! In fact she's peeking right through her fingers. Who is she? Tell me her name! P.N. Rhett Butler
Oh, you mean "[[Aremo Ganmi]] "? She's a well-known young damsel from the town of [[Primula]] in the western part of [[Dressrosa]]. She's very shy.

qa.summary: A woman named Aremo Ganmi from Primula in Dressrosa is shy and well-known for peeking through her fingers to avoid seeing Bartolomeo's 'thing'.

dialog.text: Are you and I the only ones hoping for a nip-slip from [[Rebecca]]? Are you and I the only ones who turn each page during the [[Corrida Colosseum|Colosseum]] scenes thinking, "Come on! Come on!!" P.N. Mojaman (16)

qa.summary: A reader asks about a nip-slip from Rebecca, and Oda acknowledges the excitement but mentions the weight limit and not wanting to draw her that way.

dialog.text: I hear I look like [[Wapol]]. P.N. Kozuetty

qa.summary: Reader Kozuetty mentions looking like Wapol, Oda responds with a picture of Sanji getting kicked in the groin.

dialog.text: Hey, Oda! In all of these fight scenes, why doesn't anybody go for the men's groins? Doesn't that seem like the quickest path to victory? P.N. Eldest of the Asada Siblings.

True, that is a vital area. Just imagine legends among men--Whitebeard, Shanks, Mihawk--staring each other down, bearing their weighty ideals...and trying to whack each other in the balls! IS THAT THE KIND OF MANGA YOU WANT TO READ?!

qa.summary: A reader asks why groin shots aren't used in fights, Oda humorously opposes it, imagining top characters aiming there, in an SBS session.

dialog.text: I was looking up trivia on the [[Straw Hat Pirates|Straw Hats]], and I found that although they've all been given a favorite food, I can't find anything about their least favorite. So what are each of the Straw Hats' least favorite foods? P.N. Ice Cream Nyangoro

Here you go. The reasons are inside the parentheses.
{| style="margin:auto;"
|[[File:SBS72 2 Luffy.png|75px]]||
*A certain place's cherry pie (No reason)
|[[File:SBS72 2 Zoro.png|75px]]||
*Chocolate (Too sweet)
|[[File:SBS72 2 Nami.png|75px]]||
*Orangette (If she wants fruit, she'll eat regular fruit)
|-
|[[File:SBS72 2 Usopp.png|75px]]||
*Mushrooms (Got sick once)
|[[File:SBS72 2 Sanji.png|75px]]||
*Konjac (No nutritional value)
|[[File:SBS72 2 Chopper.png|75px]]||
*Anything spicy (Not sweet enough)
|-
|[[File:SBS72 2 Robin.png|75px]]||
*Chewing gum (Can't swallow it)
|[[File:SBS72 2 Franky.png|75px]]||
*Marshmallows (Not hard enough)
|[[File:SBS72 2 Brook.png|75px]]||
*Lemon (No cheeks to make a sour face)
|}
{{-}}
[[File:SBS73 4 Ryokugyu.png|thumb|right|250px|Ryokugyu (Imagined Drawing)]]

qa.summary: Straw Hats' least favorite foods: Luffy - cherry pie, Zoro - chocolate, Nami - orangette, Usopp - mushrooms, Sanji - konjac, Chopper - spicy, Robin - chewing gum, Franky - marshmallows, Brook - lemon.

dialog.text: We've learned about two new [[Marines|Marine]] [[admiral]]s: [[Issho|Fujitora]] and [[Aramaki|Ryokugyu]]. I wondered why you went with "Fuji" (for light purple or lilac) instead of "Murasaki" (regular purple)? P.N. Aye-Aye Planet

Good question. I've made [[Sakazuki|red]], [[Kuzan|blue]], [[Borsalino|yellow]] and green, so it's natural to go with "purple" next. But when I started trying that into a Japanese name, I had "Murasakitora" and "Shitora"...

THEY DON'T ROLL OFF THE TONGUE. NOT CATCHY ENOUGH.

Well, how about "Fujitora"? Now that's cool! That's all there is to it. More importantly, what's wrong with your Ryokugyu?! As it happens, I've already designed his character, and he's super-duper cool! I can't wait to draw him.

qa.summary: Oda chose the name 'Fujitora' for the admiral to make it catchier and cooler, and explained the struggle of naming with 'Murasakitora' and 'Shitora'.

dialog.text:
[[Roronoa Zoro|Zoro]] and [[Sanji]] are always fighting! I was reading [[One Piece (Manga)|One Piece]] and thought it was odd that Zoro never seems to refer Sanji by his name, so I went back and checked!  I counted them up from [[Volume 5]] to [[Chapters and Volumes/Volume 61-70#Volume 66|66]]! Here are the results, ranked by frequency!!! {| style="margin:auto; font-size:0.8em" !width=50%; colspan=3;|How Zoro Has Referred to Sanji !width=50%; colspan=3;|How Sanji Has Referred to Zoro |- |width=10%; align=center|1st
(16 times)|| *{{Nihongo|"You bastard"|てめェ|Temee}} ---- |rowspan=3|[[File:SBS73 5 Zoro.png|100px]] |width=10%; align=center|1st
(33 times)|| *{{Nihongo|"You bastard"|てめェ|Temee}} ---- |rowspan=3|[[File:SBS73 5 Sanji.png|100px]] |- |align=center|2nd
(11 times)|| *{{Nihongo|"You" ''(Rude)''|お前|Omae}} ---- |align=center|2nd
(9 times)|| *{{Nihongo|"You" ''(Rude)''|お前|Omae}} ---- |- |align=center|3rd
(6 times)|| *{{Nihongo|"Cook"|コック|Kokku}} ---- |align=center|3rd
(7 times)|| *{{Nihongo|"You" ''(Slurred)''|おめェ|Omee}}、 *{{Nihongo|"Marimo"|マリモ|Marimo}} ---- |- |align=center|4th
(3 times) |colspan="2"| *{{Nihongo|"Stupid"|バカ|Baka}} ---- |align=center|5th
(6 times) |colspan="2"| *{{Nihongo|"Zoro"|ゾロ}}、 *{{Nihongo|"Shitty bastard"|クソ野郎|Kuso Yarō}} ---- |- |rowspan=2; align=center|5th
(2 times) |colspan=2; rowspan=2| *{{Nihongo|"Hey"|おい|Oi}}、 *{{Nihongo|"That guy"|あいつ|Aitsu}}、 *{{Nihongo|"That bastard"|あの野郎|Ano Yarō}}、 *{{Nihongo|"You" ''(slurred)''|おめェ|Omee}}、 *{{Nihongo|"Stupid cook"|バカコック|Baka Kokku}} ---- |align=center;|7th
(4 times) |colspan="2"| *{{Nihongo|"That bastard"|あの野郎|Ano Yarō}} ---- |- |align=center|8th
(3 times) |colspan=2| *{{Nihongo|"This guy"|こいつ|Koitsu}} ---- |- |rowspan=2; align=center|10th
(1 time) |rowspan=2; colspan=2| *{{Nihongo|"This guy"|こいつ|Koitsu}}、 *{{Nihongo|"Idiot cook"|アホコック|Aho Kokku}}、 *{{Nihongo|"Stupid bastard"|バカ野郎|Baka Yarō}}、 *{{Nihongo|"Shitty cook"|クソコック|Kuso Kokku}}、 *{{Nihongo|"Amazing eyebrows"|素敵マユゲ|Suteki Mayuge}}、 *{{Nihongo|"That"|あれ|Are}}、 *{{Nihongo|"Ero-kappa"|エロガッパ|Ero-gappa}}、 *{{Nihongo|"Idiot"|アホ|Aho}}、 *{{Nihongo|"Stupid eyebrows"|バカマユゲ|Baka Mayuge}}、 *{{Nihongo|"Darts"|ダーツ|Dātsu}}、 *{{Nihongo|"Darts Eyebrow"|ダーツまゆげ|Dātsu Mayuge}}、 *{{Nihongo|"Swirly swirly"|ぐるぐる|Guru guru}}、 *{{Nihongo|"Hoge-"|「ほげー」|Hogē}}、 *{{Nihongo|"Mr. Nosebleed"|Mr.鼻血|Misutā Hanaji}}、 *{{Nihongo|"Clumsy cook"|ヘボコック|Hebo Kokku}}、 *{{Nihongo|"Nosebleed-kun"|鼻血くん|Hanadi-kun}} |align=center|9th
(2 times) |colspan=2| *{{Nihongo|"Hey"|オイ|Oi}}、 *{{Nihongo|"Stupid"|バカ|Baka}}、 *{{Nihongo|"Idiot swordsman"|アホ剣士|Aho Kenshi}} ---- |- |align=center|10th
(1 time) |colspan=2| *{{Nihongo|"Pseudo swordsman"|どっかの剣士|Dokka no Kenshi}}、 *{{Nihongo|"Roronoa Zoro"|ロロノア・ゾロ|Roronoa Zoro}}、 *{{Nihongo|"Shitty swordsman"|クソ剣士|Kuso Kenshi}}、 *{{Nihongo|"Marimo-kun"|マリモ君|Marimo-kun}}、 *{{Nihongo|"Stupid swordsman"|バカ剣士|Baka Kenshi}}、 *{{Nihongo|"Shitty lost child bastard"|クソ迷子野郎|Kuso Maigo Yarō}}、 *{{Nihongo|"That guy"|あいつ|Aitsu}}、 *{{Nihongo|"Cactus-kun"|サボテン君|Saboten-kun}}、 *{{Nihongo|"Stupid musclehead"|体力バカ|Tairyoku Baka}}、 *{{Nihongo|"Marimo Head"|まりもヘッド|Marimo Heddo}}、 *{{Nihongo|"That idiot"|あのバカ|Ano Baka}}、 *{{Nihongo|"Marimo Man"|マリモマン|Marimo Man}}、 *{{Nihongo|"Idiot marimo"|バカマリモ|Baka Marimo}}、 *{{Nihongo|"Oaf"|マヌケ|Manuke}}、 *{{Nihongo|"Algae"|藻|Mo}}、 *{{Nihongo|"Marimo Swordsman"|マリモ剣士|Marimo Kenshi}}、 *{{Nihongo|"Zoro-kun"|ゾロ君|Zoro-kun}}、 *{{Nihongo|"That"|アレ|Are}}、 *{{Nihongo|"Lost child marimo"|迷子マリモ|Maigo Marimo}}、 *{{Nihongo|"Greenie"|緑|Midori}} |} In conclusion, Sanji does in fact refer to Zoro by name, but Zoro does not return the favor! P.N. Little Marron

...Okay. Thank you very much, Little Marron! So you counted them all... This was very fun to read! Some of these terms made me wonder when they'd said these things. Indeed, I have trouble imagining Zoro calling him "Sanji" by name. Not once, eh? Wow. Well, they might not get along well, but they're both valuable, trustworthy men who have Luffy's back. So let's forgive them their squabbles (laughs).

(See editor's note below)

qa.summary: A reader counted how Zoro and Sanji refer to each other, Oda finds it amusing and comments on their dynamic, forgiving their squabbles.

dialog.text:
It's nice to make your acquaintance, Oda-sensei. First of all, "You're not a naughty, big person!" Secondly, those little [[Dwarves|Tontattas]] are so goddamn cute! I want to know as many names and positions as possible. Please tell me.

If you don't, I godda rip all yoh clothes! P.N. Beautiful Lady Swordsman Carrying Meat

Huh? But I'm already naked... Okay! Here you go! Some of them haven't really been drawn clearly yet, so they only get design sketches.
[[File:SBS73 6 Dwarf Profiles.png|center|500px]]{{-}}

''Top Row:'' [[Gancho]] (Tonta-Chief); [[Leo]] (Tonta-Troop Leader); [[Bomba]] and [[Rampo]] (Vice-Chiefs); [[Kabu]] and [[Bian]] (Aviation Squad).

''Middle Row:'' [[Flapper]]; [[Bobomba]] (Bomba's younger brother); [[Maujii]]; [[Nubon]]; [[Pellini]].

''Bottom Row:'' [[Grabar]] (Leo's grandmother); [[Inhel]], [[Cotton]], [[Wicca]], [[Baxcon]] and [[Daikon]] (Reconnaissance Squad).

qa.summary: Oda provides the names and positions of the Tontattas, emphasizing that not remembering their names won't affect understanding the story.
